ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
(((NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(Inspected__c))) && (ISBLANK(Inspected__c) || PRIORVALUE(Inspected__c) <> Inspected__c ))
||
(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(Inspected__c)) && Inspected__c <= (NOW()- (1/1440)) )) || ((NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(Customer_Contacted__c))) && (ISBLANK(Customer_Contacted__c) || PRIORVALUE(Customer_Contacted__c) <> Customer_Contacted__c ))
||
(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(Customer_Contacted__c)) && Customer_Contacted__c <= (NOW() - (1/1440)) )) || ((NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(Target_Start_Date__c))) && (ISBLANK(Target_Start_Date__c) || PRIORVALUE(Target_Start_Date__c) <> Target_Start_Date__c ))
||
(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(Target_Start_Date__c)) && Target_Start_Date__c <= (NOW()- (1/1440)) )) || ((NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(Target_Job_Completion_Date__c))) && (ISBLANK(Target_Job_Completion_Date__c) || PRIORVALUE(Target_Job_Completion_Date__c) <> Target_Job_Completion_Date__c ))
||
(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(Target_Job_Completion_Date__c)) && Target_Job_Completion_Date__c <= (NOW()- (1/1440)) ))
||
((NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(Actual_Start_Date__c))) && (ISBLANK(Actual_Start_Date__c) || PRIORVALUE(Actual_Start_Date__c) <> Actual_Start_Date__c ))
||
(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(Actual_Start_Date__c)) && Actual_Start_Date__c <= (NOW()- (1/1440)) ))
|| ((NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(Actual_Job_Completion_Date__c))) && (ISBLANK(Actual_Job_Completion_Date__c) || PRIORVALUE(Actual_Job_Completion_Date__c) <> Actual_Job_Completion_Date__c ))
||
(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(Actual_Job_Completion_Date__c)) && Actual_Job_Completion_Date__c <= (NOW()- (1/1440)) ))
||
((NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(Job_Not_Sold__c))) && (ISBLANK(Job_Not_Sold__c) || PRIORVALUE(Job_Not_Sold__c) <> Job_Not_Sold__c ))
||
(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(Job_Not_Sold__c)) && Job_Not_Sold__c <= (NOW()- (1/1440)) )) ) &&
($Profile.Name != 'System Administator' || $Profile.Name != 'Restricted Process Execution')
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Control Point fields cannot be back-dated and cannot be changed once entered.
